channel.title: The Daily Micah
channel.description: Daily briefing on AI, product leadership, and Orlando news
channel.itunes:author: Ben

item.title: The Daily Micah — 2026-02-27
item.description: This episode explores a landmark ethical standoff as Anthropic’s CEO draws a hard line against military AI access, alongside a look at the "hardcore" efficiency shifts and strategic partnerships reshaping the tech industry. We also track the growing pains of autonomous vehicles in local neighborhoods, falling mortgage rates, and the evolving science of "AI neuroscience" that prioritizes logical reasoning over raw computing power. From high-stakes corporate decisions to the latest updates in aerospace and housing, this briefing covers the essential shifts shaping our technology and our communities.

item.title: The Daily Micah — 2026-02-27
item.description: Dive into the dawn of the “agentic era” as AI moves from answering questions to executing complex tasks, sparking high-stakes ethical standoffs between tech giants and the military. This episode also explores the real-world friction of driverless cars in residential neighborhoods, the latest shifts in the housing market, and surprising developments in national security and global diplomacy.
